channel.title: [562] Jomzz562 HD Client & Server (UPDATED-MARCH-17-11) [562]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i272.photobucket.com/albums/jj197/jamestrjames/jomzz562-banner.png[/img][/center] [center][b]Jomzz562 HD Client & Server[/b][/center]
[center]Green = Done || Orange = Started/Being Done || Red = Not Started/Done[/center] [size=14pt][b]Client Features Include...[/b][/size] [i]Server – Client Connections...[/i]
• Over 600 Npc’s Added so far... • Full HD – All Visual Modes Working... • Understanding Walls and Objects etc... o Walking Through Walls... o Walking Through Objects and NPC’s • Full Map Data • Items, Objects, Commands. (Client Reading).
[size=18pt][b]Server Features Include...[/b][/size] [i]Server to Client...[/i]
• Server XML, DAT Binary o Server Connections, Characters, etc... o Server Item, Object, NPC Binary... o Binary to XML Exceptions... • Player Commands, Teleports, Animations, etc... • Administrator Consol, Jails players if they have tried to us it more then three times! • New Owner Command Packet Handler • Admin Console... • New Moderator Command Packet Handler • Normal/Non Member Command Packet Handler • Basic Walking and Running Packets • Basic Chat Box Handlers • Basic Pm System. No Glitch Crowns. Friends Online, Enemies etc... • Secret Files... • Easy to use Welcome Message Handlers...
More Features going to be listed soon... Just have to find them all...
[center]Hello Welcome to the Jomzz562 Development Project. I have been coding RuneScape Private Servers for about 3 years now. Started with Moparscape 3.2 lol... Then I realized there was more behind a game then downloading a client base from a site. I have made several 317 bases and 508s. This is my third time trying to make a 562, (All the Sources I tried to use before would stop running after I added a shop). I am looking for 3 Coder. These 3 coders would be Administrators, and the only Administrators for Jomzz562. So far there are 2 Owners, Me (TheJamDude/James), and a good friend of mine who can code. Sorry I do not have pictures soon, I am going to be talking them soon. So far I am working on adding shops, adding the content handlers.
Rep++ [/center]
[center][size=18pt]Pictures! Coming soon....[/size][/center]

item.title: [562] Jomzz562 HD Client & Server (UPDATED-MARCH-17-11) [562]
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

Bers:

Nice. Im going to join. And first Post w00t!

lol, and thanks This isn’t my first RSPS though, I use to make 317, and 508s…

I guess this is my first 562… Starting from Scratch lol…

Commands are almost completly done, Just added some more… and I will add a new list…

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Jomzz562 HD Client & Server (UPDATED-MARCH-17-11) [562]
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]Jomzz562 HD Client & Server[/center]

[center]Green = Done || Orange = Started/Being Done || Red = Not Started/Done[/center]
[size=14pt]Client Features Include…[/size]
Server – Client Connections…

• Over 600 Npc’s Added so far…
• Full HD – All Visual Modes Working…
• Understanding Walls and Objects etc…
o Walking Through Walls…
o Walking Through Objects and NPC’s
• Full Map Data
• Items, Objects, Commands. (Client Reading).

[size=18pt]Server Features Include…[/size]
Server to Client…

• Server XML, DAT Binary
o Server Connections, Characters, etc…
o Server Item, Object, NPC Binary…
o Binary to XML Exceptions…
• Player Commands, Teleports, Animations, etc…
• Administrator Consol, Jails players if they have tried to us it more then three times!
• New Owner Command Packet Handler
• Admin Console…
• New Moderator Command Packet Handler
• Normal/Non Member Command Packet Handler
• Basic Walking and Running Packets
• Basic Chat Box Handlers
• Basic Pm System. No Glitch Crowns. Friends Online, Enemies etc…
• Secret Files…
• Easy to use Welcome Message Handlers…

More Features going to be listed soon… Just have to find them all…

[center]Hello Welcome to the Jomzz562 Development Project. I have been coding RuneScape Private Servers for about 3 years now. Started with Moparscape 3.2 lol… Then I realized there was more behind a game then downloading a client base from a site. I have made several 317 bases and 508s. This is my third time trying to make a 562, (All the Sources I tried to use before would stop running after I added a shop). I am looking for 3 Coder. These 3 coders would be Administrators, and the only Administrators for Jomzz562. So far there are 2 Owners, Me (TheJamDude/James), and a good friend of mine who can code.
Sorry I do not have pictures soon, I am going to be talking them soon. So far I am working on adding shops, adding the content handlers.

Rep++
[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Pictures!
Coming soon…[/size][/center]
